name: Aspirin
text: Treats pain, fever, arthritis, and inflammation. It may also be used to reduce the risk of heart attack.

name: Synthroid
text: Treats hyperthyroidism, enlarged thyroid gland, and thyroid cancer

name: Crestor
text: Lowers high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

name: Nexium
text: Treats heartburn, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), stomach ulcers, and a damaged esophagus.

name: Ventolin HFA
text: Treats asthma, bronchitis, and similar breathing problems.

name: Advair Diskus
text: Prevents symptoms of asthma or COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease).

name: Cymbalta
text: Treats depression, anxiety, diabetic peripheral neuropathy, fibromyalgia, or chronic muscle or bone pain.

name: Diovan
text: Treats high blood pressure and heart failure. May lower the risk of death in patients who have had a heart attack.

name: Vyvanse
text: Treats attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD). This medicine is a stimulant.

name: Lantus Solostar
text: Treats diabetes.

name: Lyrica
text: Treats nerve and muscle pain caused by diabetes, shingles, fibromyalgia, or a spinal cord injury.

name: Spiriva Handihaler
text: Prevents the symptoms of bronchospasm caused by emphysema, chronic bronchitis, or COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease).

name: Lantus
text: Treats diabetes.

name: Celebrex
text: Treats pain, including pain caused by arthritis in children and adults.

name: Januvia
text: Treats type 2 diabetes. Used together with proper diet and exercise to help control high blood sugar.

name: Abilify
text: Treats schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and depression. Also treats irritability associated with autism.

name: Namenda
text: Treats dementia (memory loss and mental changes) that is a sign of Alzheimer's disease.

name: Viagra
text: Treats erectile dysfunction (trouble having an erection).

name: Zetia
text: Lowers cholesterol in your blood. May be used in combination with another cholesterol-lowering medicine called a 'statin.'

name: Cialis
text: Treats erectile dysfunction (trouble having an erection).

name: Nasonex
text: Treats nasal symptoms of both seasonal (outdoor) and year-round (indoor) allergic rhinitis in adults and children 2 years and older.

name: Suboxone
text: Treats moderate to severe chronic pain. This medicine is a narcotic analgesic.

name: Bystolic
text: Treats high blood pressure.

name: Symbicort
text: Prevents asthma attacks.

name: Flovent HFA
text: Flovent is a corticosteroid used to prevent bronchial asthma attacks.

name: Oxycontin
text: Treats moderate to severe pain when around-the-clock pain relief is needed for a long period of time.

name: Levemir
text: Treats diabetes mellitus. This medicine is a long-acting insulin.

name: Nuvaring
text: Used for birth control. This medicine is a contraceptive.

name: Dexilant
text: Treats heartburn, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), or damaged esophagus.

name: Benicar
text: Angiotensin II receptor antagonist. Keeps blood vessels from narrowing, which lowers blood pressure and improves blood flow.

name: Voltaren Gel
text: Treats actinic keratoses. Also treats pain and swelling caused by arthritis. This is an NSAID.

name: Proventil HFA
text: Treats asthma, bronchitis, and similar breathing problems. This medicine is a bronchodilator.

name: Xarelto
text: This medicine is a blood thinner that treats and prevents blood clots.

name: Premarin
text: Treats hot flashes and other symptoms of menopause or low amounts of estrogen.

name: Novolog
text: Treats diabetes mellitus. This type of insulin is similar to regular insulin, but acts in the body more quickly.

name: Tamiflu
text: Treats and helps prevent influenza.

name: Novolog Flexpen
text: Treats diabetes mellitus. This type of insulin is similar to regular insulin, but acts in the body more quickly.

name: Vesicare
text: Treats symptoms of an overactive bladder.

name: Benicar HCT
text: Angiotensin II receptor antagonist. Keeps blood vessels from narrowing, which lowers blood pressure and improves blood flow.

name: Humalog
text: Treats diabetes mellitus. This type of insulin starts working faster than regular insulin.

name: Afluria
text: Influenza Vaccine for intramuscular injection

name: Lumigan
text: The eyedrops reduce pressure inside the eye. The eyelash solution helps eyelashes grow.

name: Vytorin
text: Lowers high cholesterol and triglyceride levels

name: Toprol XL
text: Beta-blocker used to treat angina and high blood pressure.

name: Lunesta
text: Treats insomnia (sleep disorder).

name: Janumet
text: Treats type 2 diabetes. Used together with proper diet and exercise to help control high blood sugar.

name: Ortho Tri-Cyclen
text: Treats moderate acne vulgaris in females at least 15 years of age

name: Pristiq
text: Treats depression. This medicine is a selective serotonin and norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI).

name: Lo Loestrin Fe
text: A combination medicine that contains female hormones that prevent ovulation

name: Focalin XR
text: Indicated for the treatment of Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) in patients aged 6 years and older.

name: Travatan Z
text: Eyedrops used for increased eye pressure and open-angle glaucoma

name: Evista
text: Treats and prevents osteoporosis in women

name: Pataday
text: Eyedrops to prevent itchy, red, or watery eyes due to allergies

name: Combivent Respimat
text: Used in treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)

name: Avodart
text: Used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) in men with an enlarged prostate

name: Pradaxa
text: Prevents stroke and blood clots in petients with atrial fibrilation

name: Humalog Kwikpen
text: Fast-acting form of Insulin used to treat type 1 (insulin-dependent) diabetes

name: Seroquel XR
text: Oral antipsychotic drug prescribed for treatment of schizophrenia

name: Strattera
text: Treats ADHD

name: Chantix
text: Used to aid in quiting smoking

name: Exforge
text: Treats high blood pressure

name: Exelon
text: Treats dementia associated with Alzheimer's disease or Parkinson's disease

name: Humira
text: Treats arthritis and Crohn disease

name: Loestrin 24 Fe
text: Birth control, medicine to prevent ovulation

name: Victoza 3-Pak
text: Used in treatment of type 2 diabetes and weight loss

name: Welchol
text: Used in lowering cholesterol in the blood and improving glycemic control in people with type 2 diabetes.

name: Combigan
text: Treats increased pressure in the eye caused by glaucoma or hypertension

name: Onglyza
text: Medication for diabetics to help control blood sugar levels

name: Xopenex HFA
text: Treating and preventing breathing problems in patient who have asthma or certain airway diseases

name: Detrol La
text: Reduces spasms of the bladder muscles. Used to treat overactive bladder with symptoms of urinary frequency, urgency, and incontinence

name: Premarin Vaginal
text: Used for the relief of vaginal symptoms in postmenopausal women

name: Minastrin 24 Fe
text: Birth control pill

name: Enbrel
text: Treats rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, and plaque psoriasis

name: Dulera
text: Combination inhaler

name: Ranexa
text: Treats chronic angina (chest pain)

name: Truvada
text: Treats HIV infection. Also used to reduce the risk of HIV Infection.

name: Alphagan P
text: Eye medication that is approved for lowering high eye pressure in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension

name: Actonel
text: Prevents or treats osteoporosis (weak bones)

name: Azor
text: Treats high blood pressure

name: Effient
text: Prevents strokes and heart attacks in patients who need to have percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI)

name: Viibryd
text: Antidepressant used for treatment of major depressive disorder

name: Levitra
text: Treats erectile dysfunction

name: Norvir
text: Treats HIV infections. Does not cure HIV or AIDS, but may reduce the progress of the disease

name: Lipitor
text: Lowers high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

name: Tradjenta
text: Treats type 2 diabetes. Used with proper dieting and exercise to control high blood sugar levels

name: Aggrenox
text: Keeps blood clots from forming after some types of heart surgery. Also used to prevent strokes and heart attacks

name: Patanol
text: Used to treat itching, burning, redness, watering, and other eye symptoms caused by allergic conditions

name: Amitiza
text: Treats constipation and irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)

name: Advair HFA
text: Used to help in asthma

name: Lotemax
text: Treats redness, itching, or watering of the eyes.

name: Uloric
text: Used to treat hyperuricemia in patients with gout

name: Ortho Evra 3
text: Contraceptive patch used for the prevention of pregnancy

name: Asmanex Twisthaler
text: Used as maintenance treatment that helps prevent and control asthma symptoms

name: Prempro Low Dose
text: Used to treat the symptoms of menopause such as hot flashes

name: Micardis
text: Treats high blood pressure. Can reduce the risk of stroke and heart attack

name: Atripla
text: Treats HIV infection

name: Novolog Flexpen Mix
text: Used for fast-acting insulin to treat type 1 diabetes

name: Aciphex
text: Treats heartburn, stomach ulcers, and gastroesophageal reflux (GERD).

name: Humulin N
text: Intermediate-acting insuling used to treat diabetes

name: advil
text: Treats pain and fever. This medicine is an NSAID.

name: Aleve
text: Treats fever and pain, including pain caused by arthritis, gout, menstrual cramps, tendinitis, headache, backache, and toothache.

name: Cepacol
text: Kills the germs that cause bad breath, reduces plaque, and freshens breath.

name: Dimetapp
text: Treats nasal congestion associated with allergies, hay fever, and the common cold.

name: Claritin
text: Treats allergy (hay fever) symptoms and hives. This medicine is an antihistamine.

name: Colace
text: Keeps stools soft for easy, natural passage and is not a stimulant laxative.

name: Cortaid
text: Relieves of poison sumac, insect bites, soaps, detergents, cosmetics, jewelry.

name: Dulcolax
text: Treats constipation.

name: Excedrin
text: Headache pain reliever.

name: Gaviscon
text: Provides heartburn relief.

name: Lotrimin AF
text: An antifungal medication that fights infections caused by fungus.

name: Maalox Antacid
text: Used to relieve acid indigestion, heartburn, and sour stomach symptoms.

name: Midol
text: Relieves symptoms of menstrual periods such as minor cramps, headache, bloating, backache, muscle aches, and fatigue.

name: Motrin IB
text: Relieves pain from various conditions such as headache, dental pain, menstrual cramps, muscle aches, or arthritis.

name: Orajel
text: Relieves pain associated with mouth injuries such as canker sores, cold sores and fever blisters.

name: Pepto-Bismol
text: Upset stomach reliever reliever/antidiarrheal

name: Rolaids
text: Antacid/Calcium and Magnesium Supplement

name: Tagamet HB
text: Relieves and prevents heartburn and acid indigestion

name: Tylenol
text: Pain reliever and fever reducer

name: Zantac
text: Prevents and relieves heartburn associated with acid indigestion and sour stomach

name: Sudafed
text: Relieves sinus pressure, pain and congestion related to the common cold, allergies or other sinus problems.

name: Nyquil
text: Intended for the relief of various symptoms of the common cold.

name: Tums
text: Treats heartburn, sour stomach, acid indigestion, and upset stomach.

name: Mucinex
text: Helps to thin and loosen mucus, relieve congestion, and suppress cough.

name: Afrin
text: Eases nasal congestion and sinusitis.
